---
id: update-action
title: "Update action"
description: "Updates the details of the action identified by the given `actionId`. The `source` of an existing action cannot be changed."

hide_title: true

api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update action"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/actions/{actionId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the details of the action identified by the given `actionId`. The `source` of an existing action cannot be changed.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
